parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: Group ID of the MQTT version of the micro message queue.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Message Queue MQTT version instance, which must match the actual instance ID used by the client. You can obtain this ID from the **Instance Details** page in the console.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Token for starting the next page query.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: Indicates the page number of the returned results. The starting page is counted from 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The maximum number of query records to display per page. 
Value range: 1 to 100.
